New Records: Dinesh Karthik hit a maiden fifty in his first T20I since 2006
South Africa managed only 87-9 in their chase
Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik's innings turned the game around for India
South Africa's poor chase led to their defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series was sent to a decider
India played without several key players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
Others: Avesh Khan was the most successful bowler for India with 4-18
